description:
Kazuki, Aya, Mizuki, and Reiko get an inside look at what it’s like to work for a popular manga magazine. An eye-opening experience breeds enlightenment and inspiration for our doujinshi-making hero. There’s no stopping him now!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arise Kazuki, It Is Time for World Conquest
立て, 和樹!世界征服だ!
